cinimaticCaption.caption: ANDERS: Sergeant, is this what the aliens were after?
FORGE: Seems so, ma'am. They sure paid a price trying to defend it.
All quiet now.
Hey! What are you doing?
ANDERS: Nothing ventured, nothing gained.
Now that's... not what I expected!
ELITE: Heresy! Remove this filth!
FORGE: These guys just don't know when to quit!
Uh, Spirit, Forge. We're going to need a little backup.
